message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.DS

This paper discusses the use of blockchain in enhancing the security of IoT devices and systems. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also focuses on the communication and networking aspects of IoT, which suggests the category cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) as the second likely category. The paper also discusses the architecture and design of the system, which could fall under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed system, which could fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
